00038 class PolynomialKernel

00048   PolynomialKernel(const double degree = 2.0, const double offset = 0.0) :
00049       degree(degree),
00050       offset(offset)
00051   { }
00052 
00062   template<typename VecType>
00063   double Evaluate(const VecType& a, const VecType& b) const
00064   {
00065     return pow((arma::dot(a, b) + offset), degree);
00066   }
00067 
00069   const double& Degree() const { return degree; }

00086   }
